text: Brighton is a suburb in Metro Detroit in the southeast portion of Livingston County in the U.S. state of Michigan. As of the 2020 census, the city population was 7,446.https://www.census.gov/quickfacts/fact/map/brightoncitymichigan,livingstoncountymichigan,MI,US/POP010220 ==Schools== Brighton 2 middle schools-Scranton and Maltby. It also has a high school, and a number of elementary schools. ==References== Category:Cities in Michigan
title: Brighton, Michigan
